name: EUTOP Frankfurt Finance GmbH
goal:
EUTOP acts as a structural process partner, supporting the work of private companies, associations and organisations at the institutions of the European Union and selected EU member states.

EUTOP approaches the growing complexity in the EU decision-making structure by combining the client’s content competence with process structure competence and raising this combination to the power of the original OnePager®-Methodology (perspective change competence) and PSGR® (process support competence).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: EUTOP accompanies its clients in EU policy areas such as - but not limited to - Financial Services and Capital Markets Union, Competition Policy or Consumer Policy.
